definitions.title: n.f. a cutting, hewing
definitions.body: —[[גׇּזִית]] Ex 20:25 + 10 t., always abs.;—hewing, ´[[אַבְנֵי ג]] = hewn stones (building-stones) 1Ki 5:31, 1Ch 22:2, Ez Eze 40:42 (for tables), cf. ´[[אֲבָנִים יְקָרוֹת כְּמִדּוֹת ג]] 1Ki 7:9, 1Ki 7:11 (but Klo del. as gloss, cf. LXX); also without [[אבני]] = hewn stones Ex 20:25 (altar) Am 5:11 (´[[בָּֽתֵּי ג]]) Is 9:9 (opp. [[לְבֵנִים]]); ´[[טוּרֵי ג]] 1Ki 6:36, ´[[טוּרִים ג]] 1Ki 7:12; gz0; also La 3:9 ´[[גׇּדַר דַּרְכִּי בְּג]].
